title: Expand carousel to full viewport width and height

requirements.text: Expand the HeroCarousel component to occupy the full viewport width and height (100vw × 100vh), ensuring it fills the entire screen on a laptop without scrolling. The carousel container, slide wrappers, and any inner content containers should all stretch to fill the full viewport dimensions.

quotes: extend the caraosel a bit larger such that it fits my laptop's full screen
Making the carousel full-screen now — expanding it to fill the full viewport width and height on your laptop!

acceptanceCriteria: The HeroCarousel occupies 100vw × 100vh on page load with no overflow or clipping.
All three slides stretch to fill the full viewport.
Navigation arrows and dot indicators remain visible and accessible at full-screen dimensions.
No vertical or horizontal scrollbars appear due to the carousel itself.
The carousel looks correct on a standard laptop screen (e.g., 1280×800 to 1920×1080).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Preserve the existing 3-slide content, auto-rotate behavior, navigation arrows, and dot indicators.
nonGoals: Changing carousel content, images, or slide copy.
Adding new slides or removing existing ones.
